descriptionHtml:
============
DESCRIPTION
============
This mod add Adarath - Dark Elf
Voice Even Toned , Age  = 22
Essential , 1H weapon , Heavy Armor
[color=blue]You can find his in Four Shields , Dragon Bridge [/color]
I hope you like it

============
REQUIRED
============
Apachii Sky Hair 1.4


=============
RECOMMENDED
=============
HighResMaps by Geonox


=============
INSTALLATION 
=============
Setup all files to your data folder


=============
UNINSTALLATION
=============
Delete bsa and esp files


=============

CREDITS:
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod
author: Den987
